text: The 1927 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 25–March 1, 1927, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The Vanderbilt Commodores won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Josh Cody.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6.
